text:
Daniel Kevin Fogler (born October 20, 1976) is an American actor, comedian and writer. In 2005, he won a Tony Award.
He had roles in "Balls of Fury", "Good Luck Chuck", "Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them", ', "Kung Fu Panda", "Horton Hears a Who!", and "Mars Needs Moms".

annotations.surface_form: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
